about_the_game:
Survive the Zombie-Infested Island

Gorfest is a survival first person shooter game where you must fight against an island full of zombies. You need to scavenge the island for food, medical kits, ammo, weapons, and fuel, using any weapon you can find with limited ammo.

Explore the Open World Island

Explore the open world island of Gorefest to find various quests for various characters of the island. These quests will reward you with experiences you can use to purchase new skills or items, such as weapons, ammo, food, and more. You also gain experience when you kill a zombie.

Stay Alive Through Food, Drink, and More

Maintaining your health and survival is key in Gorfest. In order to stay alive, you must eat and drink on a regular basis or face death from hunger or thirst. You can also drive around the island in various vehicles, but you will need fuel to make them work. If your vehicle breaks down, you must find a repair kit to fix it.

Fight Your Way to Victory

Gorfest provides a thrilling challenge as you fight your way through the zombie-infested island. Use the resources you find to stay alive and increase your skills as you battle your way to victory!

Take beautiful photos

Use our powerful photo mode to make awesome photos in gorfest and share them with your friends!

content_descriptors.notes: It's a post apocalyptic game with fights and blood

short_description: Discover an intense post-apocalyptic survival FPS, with a thrilling story. Scavenge the island for food, ammo, weapons and fuel while fighting off hordes of zombies in a massive open world. Keep your hunger and thirst in check, and be prepared to repair vehicles when needed. It's time to survive!
